content.question: In accordance with Roman religious practice, which of the following acts might the characters in this passage have done to understand the will of the gods?

choices.label: Throw animal bones to see how they fell

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
